timeline.bodyText: Are you sure this cast is needed? I think you can remove it completely. Same comment for all the other similar changes below
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText:
Yes this cast and all the similar ones are required because ProcessEventListenerConfig, the return type of processEventListeners() method, contains only the listeners() method to retrieve the existing listeners.
Only CachedProcessEventListenerConfig exposes the register method to add new ones.
replies.author: kostola

timeline.message: [KOGITO-1492] Fix tests to align with kogito-runtimes changes
